text: There will be no power supply in Nangavalli; Vanavasi; Veerakkal; Soorapalli; Kuttapatti; Soragai; Manathal; Kuppampatti and surrounding areas from 9 a.m. to 5.30 p.m. on January 12 due to maintenance work on the Nangavalli sub-station, according to an official press release.
title: Power shutdown
